analysis.description:
Reclaimable.reclaim (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#1008-1021) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- reclaimer.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#1013-1014)

BasicSnapshotToken._balances (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#1971-1972) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#2182-2221)
	- allBalancesOf (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#2111-2130)
	- balanceOfAtInternal (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#2153-2173)
	- mGenerateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#2269-2284)
	- mDestroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#2286-2304)
IdentityRecord.deserializeClaims (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#216-230) is declared view but contains assembly code
IsContract.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#742-746) is declared view but contains assembly code
NeumarkIssuanceCurve.cumulative (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#828-864) is declared view but contains assembly code

Agreement.acceptAgreementInternal (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#713-725) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _signatories[accepter] == 0

	- require(bool)(start < base + 2 ** 128) (/unique_contracts/0x7b40d0ce14abc2cfa75c96d1ff9bb1085f826e46.sol#1122-1124)
